Module com.fy916.bubblebobble

Package com.fy916.bubblebobble.utilities

package com.fy916.bubblebobble.utilities
  • Class Summary
    Class
    Description
    FileReader
    This class includes some utilities that facilitate the usage of loading from external files.
    Demonstrates Single Responsibility and FACTORY Design Pattern.
    GameScores
    This class includes some utilities that facilitate the control of leader board names and scores, along with saving the current game scores.
    Demonstrates Single Responsibility, SINGLETON and FACTORY Design Pattern.
    GameStatus
    This class includes some utilities that facilitate saving the game status such as the level, difficulty, background choice, bubble color, player lives, total player lives and the total levels the game has.
    LevelStatus
    This class includes some utilities that facilitate noting the game winning status such as win, lose and victory, along with some methods that provides to set the field.
    RenderObjects
    The GameObject renderer which loads the images from external files and then render it on the screen.
    Realizes Single Responsibility Principle and FACADE and FACTORY Design Pattern.
    SoundEffect
    The Class handles the sound effect of the game and has been transferred to utilize the JAVAFX AudioClip.
